name: Northumbria
startIntroPart1: King Eadwine of Northumbria, the first Christian king of Northumbria and a crucial role in the early Christianization of England. Your reign united the kingdom of Bernicia and Deira which then sparked a period of expansion and consolidation of Northumbrian power. Oh, King Edwin, can you once again unite the divided nations of the world? Can you create great prosperity once more? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your land will be put into good use, do not worry!
attacked: You stand no chance against us, fool!
defeated: I have been defeated, my kingdom is yours.
introduction: Have you heard of our lord and savior Jesus Christ?
hateHello: What the hell do you want?
tradeRequest: Northumbria requires your support, but you will be repaid for it.
uniques: [+2 Faith, +2 Culture] <in cities following our religion>
Free [Great General] appears <after founding a religion>
